typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		time_requested as string,
		last_updated as string,
		SiteRep as (DV as (type as string, dataDate as string, Location as (elevation as string, name as string, i as string, country as string, lon as string, Period as (Rep as (Pp as string, D as string, G as string, F as string, H as string, S as string, U as string, T as string, W as string, V as string, {$} as string), type as string, value as string), lat as string, continent as string)[]), Wx as (Param as (units as string, name as string, {$} as string)[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> JSON
JSON derive(Location = SiteRep.DV.Location) ~> DrillToLocation
DrillToLocation select(mapColumn(
		Location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FlattenLocationArray
FlattenLocationArray foldDown(unroll(Location, Location),
	mapColumn(
		Elevation = Location.elevation,
		Name = Location.name,
		Country = Location.country,
		Lon = Location.lon,
		Lat = Location.lat,
		Continent = Location.continent,
		PrecipitationProbability = Location.Period.Rep.Pp,
		WindDirection = Location.Period.Rep.D,
		WindGust = Location.Period.Rep.G,
		FeelsLikeTemperature = Location.Period.Rep.F,
		ScreenRelativeHumidity = Location.Period.Rep.H,
		WindSpeed = Location.Period.Rep.S,
		MaxUVIndex = Location.Period.Rep.U,
		Temperature = Location.Period.Rep.T,
		WeatherType = Location.Period.Rep.W,
		Visibility = Location.Period.Rep.V
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenLocationFully
FlattenLocationFully sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToAvro
FlattenLocationFully sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		elevation as string,
		name as string,
		i as string,
		country as string,
		lon as string,
		lat as string,
		continent as string,
		time_type as string,
		time_value as string,
		{Precipitation Probability} as string,
		{Wind Direction} as string,
		{Wind Gust} as string,
		{Feels Like Temperature} as string,
		{Screen Relative Humidity} as string,
		{Wind Speed} as string,
		{Max UV Index} as string,
		Temperature as string,
		{Weather Type} as string,
		Visibility as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToParquet
FlattenLocationFully sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToORC
FlattenLocationFully sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToJSON
